Hello!

Welcome to my website. I am a publishing professional living in the Boston area. I’m a problem-solver, and I like to fix things: print books, ebooks, and websites. I am currently available to help you!

Accepting new projects. Services I provide include:

  • Print book design
  • Fixed layout and reflowable ebooks
  • Website design and development with Wordpress and static websites
  • Workflow consultation

Feel free to explore my site and get in touch.
